SELECT ROWNUM, X.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND N.STATUS = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = '2' AND MEMBER_LEVEL = 10 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) X WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND N.STATUS = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = '1' AND MEMBER_LEVEL = 10 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) X
UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, WRITER, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ?, CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
